mapper.select: select keywordName, keywordNo from keyword where memberNo = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO keyword(keywordName, keywordNo, memberNo) VALUES (#{keywordName}, keyword_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo})
mapper.delete: delete from keyword WHERE memberNo = #{memberNo} and keywordName = #{keywordName}
mapper.select: SELECT m.memberNo, email, name, nickName, pwd, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, gender, modifyDate, recentDate, profile, authority, enabled, memberShip FROM member m JOIN Authority a ON m.memberNo = a.memberNo WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE member m JOIN authority a ON a.memberNo = m.memberNo SET m.email = #{email}, m.name= #{name}, m.nickName= #{nickName}, m.birth = TO_DATE(#{birth},'YYYY-MM-DD')
UPDATE member m JOIN authority a ON a.memberNo = m.memberNo SET m.email = #{email}, m.pwd= #{pwd}, m.name= #{name}, m.nickName= #{nickName}, m.birth = TO_DATE(#{birth},'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.select: SELECT memberNo, memberNo2 FROM memberactivities WHERE a.memberNo = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM memberactivities where memberNo=#{memberNo} and memberNo2 = #{memberNo2}
mapper.select: SELECT r.qnaAnswer, r.memberNo, nickName, q.qnaNo, qnaAContent, r.qnaARegdate, q.qnaContent, qnaSubject, NVL(qnaAReplyCount, 0) qnaAReplyCount FROM QnaReply r JOIN member m ON r.memberNo = m.memberNo LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT qnaReply, COUNT(*) qnaAReplyCount FROM QnaReply WHERE qnaReply!=0 GROUP BY qnaReply ) a ON r.qnaAnswer = a.qnaReply JOIN qna q on q.qnaNo = r.qnaNo WHERE r.memberNo =#{memberNo} ORDER BY r.qnaAnswer DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM qnaReply WHERE qnaAnswer= #{qnaAnswer} AND memberNo = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT nr.replyNo, content, regDate, newsNo, nr.memberNo, nickName, NVL(likeCount,0) likeCount, NVL(userReplyLiked,0) userReplyLiked, profile FROM newsReply nr JOIN member m ON m.memberNo = nr.memberNo LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT replyNo, COUNT(*) likeCount FROM newsReplyLike GROUP BY replyNo ) nrl ON nr.replyNo = nrl.replyNo LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT replyNo, COUNT(*) userReplyLiked FROM newsReplyLike nrlRe JOIN member m ON m.memberNo = nrlRe.memberNo GROUP BY replyNo ) nrl2 ON nr.replyNo = nrl2.replyNo WHERE nr.memberNo = #{memberNo} ORDER BY replyNo
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM newsReply WHERE replyNo = #{replyNo} AND memberNo = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT bookmarkNum, newsNo, memberNo, bookmarkName FROM Bookmark WHERE memberNo = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM bookMark WHERE bookmarkNum = #{bookmarkNum} and memberNo = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT n.newsNo, title, originLink, hitCount, categoryNo, NVL(bookMarked, 0) bookMarked FROM NEWS n LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT newsNo, COUNT(*) bookMarked FROM bookmark bm JOIN member m ON m.memberNo = bm.memberNo WHERE m.memberNo = #{memberNo} GROUP BY newsNo ) bm ON bm.newsNo = n.newsNo WHERE n.newsNo = #{newsNo} ORDER BY newsNo
